title: Implementation Details
description: Details about the SDK, library or service used in an application's or web page's implementation of a service.

xdm:name.title: Name
xdm:name.description: SDK or endpoint identifier. All SDKs or endpoints are identified through a URI, this includes extensions.

xdm:version.title: Version
xdm:version.description: The version identifier of the API, e.g h.18.
